item.description:
As we transition into Winter lets meet at Jacob Wirths to raise a few steins and check out the trivia doled out by Morgan J. White, Jr.

Morgan is the undisputed Master of the Trivia Universe. After 30 years he continues to amaze folks with his one-of-a kind trivia show at which you provide categories and he uses his mind-boggling breadth of knowledge to create questions on the spot for your chance at prizes. Along with being smart Morgan is personable and exudes a geeky coolness.

Trivia begins at 5:30 p.m. and ends at 7:00 p.m.

Get there when you can and stay as long as you are able.

Bring your Red Sox, Baseball and sports category trivia questions.

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers.

Jacob Wirth is one of Boston's oldest restaurants and provides the closest approximation of a lively Bavarian bier garden with a great and varied beer selection as well as large communal tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Seated at the High Tables close to the Trivia Guy
item.name: Trivia with Morgan J. White Jr. and Octoberfest Happy Hour
